name: Obunga - Nextbot Horror Game
description:
Obunga - Nextbot have fun and enjoy more features.

Obunga - Nextbot, have multiple characters to fight and hide from, Obunga will keep chasing you and you have to keep running and hiding and solve puzzles, Obunga - Nextbot is a character that you need to run from,

Download Obunga - Nextbot, and start having fun.
